articles.title: Ban of ineffective phenylephrine could affect access to other remedies - UPI News
articles.description: America's most popular cold medications contain a nasal decongestant that doesn't work, creating a knotty dilemma for regulators, a new study reports.
articles.content:
America's most popular cold medications contain a nasal decongestant that doesn't work, creating a knotty dilemma for regulators, a new study reports.
